posts.topic_title: My 1 lines code in Java, C++, and Python

posts.java: public class Solution {--newline--    public String convertToTitle(int n) {--newline--        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();--newline----newline--        while(n>0){--newline--            n--;--newline--            result.insert(0, (char)('A' + n % 26));--newline--            n /= 26;--newline--        }--newline----newline--        return result.toString();--newline--    }--newline--}

posts.cpp: class Solution {--newline--public:--newline--    string convertToTitle(int n) {--newline--            string ans;--newline--            while (n) {--newline--                ans = char ((n - 1) % 26 + 'A') + ans;--newline--                n = (n - 1) / 26;--newline--            }--newline--            return ans;--newline--        }--newline--}
posts.topic_title: Share my simple solution, just a little trick to handle corner case 26

posts.java: public class Solution {--newline--public String convertToTitle(int n) {--newline--    String res = "";--newline--    while(n != 0) {--newline--        char ch = (char)((n - 1) % 26 + 65);--newline--        n = (n - 1) / 26;--newline--        res = ch + res;--newline--    }--newline--    return res;--newline--}--newline--}
posts.topic_title: My easy to understand JAVA solution

posts.python: class Solution:--newline----tab--    # @return a string--newline----tab--    def convertToTitle(self, num):--newline----tab--        capitals = [chr(x) for x in range(ord('A'), ord('Z')+1)]--newline----tab--        result = []--newline----tab--        while num > 0:--newline----tab--            result.append(capitals[(num-1)%26])--newline----tab--            num = (num-1) // 26--newline----tab--        result.reverse()--newline----tab--        return ''.join(result)
